mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expense_record (footprint_id, payer_id, category, amount, expense_date, description, create_time) VALUES (#{footprintId}, #{payerId}, #{category}, #{amount}, #{expenseDate}, #{description}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT e.id, e.footprint_id, e.payer_id, e.category, e.amount, e.expense_date, e.description, e.create_time, COALESCE(u.real_name, u.username) as payerName FROM expense_record e LEFT JOIN users u ON e.payer_id = u.id WHERE e.footprint_id = #{footprintId} ORDER BY e.expense_date DESC, e.create_time DESC
SELECT category, SUM(amount) as totalAmount FROM expense_record WHERE footprint_id = #{footprintId} GROUP BY category ORDER BY totalAmount DESC

SELECT e.id, e.footprint_id, e.payer_id, e.category, e.amount, e.expense_date, e.description, e.create_time, COALESCE(u.real_name, u.username) as payerName FROM expense_record e LEFT JOIN users u ON e.payer_id = u.id WHERE e.id = #{id}
